name: Pending Tickets Summary
query:
SELECT
 CASE
 WHEN EXISTS (
 SELECT 1
 FROM `tabHD Agent` a2
 WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(t._assign, JSON_QUOTE(a2.user))
 AND a2.user != t.custom_team_lead
 )
 THEN (
 SELECT a3.agent_name
 FROM `tabHD Agent` a3
 WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(t._assign, JSON_QUOTE(a3.user))
 AND a3.user != t.custom_team_lead
 ORDER BY a3.agent_name
 LIMIT 1
 )
 WHEN JSON_CONTAINS(t._assign, JSON_QUOTE(t.custom_team_lead))
 AND JSON_LENGTH(t._assign) = 1
 THEN u.full_name
 ELSE 'Unassigned'
 END AS Technician,

 t.name AS `Ticket ID`,
 t.status AS Status,
 CASE WHEN t.status = 'Pending' THEN r.pending_reason ELSE NULL END AS Reason,
 t.customer AS Customer,
 t.team AS Team,
 t.creation AS Date,
 DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), DATE(t.creation)) AS `Pending Days`

FROM `tabHD Ticket` t

LEFT JOIN `tabUser` u ON u.name = t.custom_team_lead
LEFT JOIN `tabHD Ticket Pending Reason` r ON r.name = t.custom_pending_reason

WHERE
 t.status IN ('Open', 'Pending', 'Testing', 'Claimed')

 AND (
 %(from_date)s IS NULL OR t.creation >= %(from_date)s
 )
 AND (
 %(to_date)s IS NULL OR t.creation <= %(to_date)s
 )

 AND (
 %(team)s IS NULL OR t.team = %(team)s OR t.team IS NULL
 )

 AND (
 %(agent)s IS NULL OR t._assign IS NULL OR JSON_CONTAINS(t._assign, JSON_QUOTE((SELECT user FROM `tabHD Agent` WHERE name = %(agent)s)))
 )

ORDER BY t.name;
